channel.title: admin on Jinliang Liu
channel.description: Recent content in admin on Jinliang Liu

item.description: I’m a physical oceanographer with an interest in multiscale physical and biogeochemical processes in the ocean. During my PhD, I have been using a variety of numerical tools, ranging from the NCAR large-eddy simulation (LES) model to the Coupled-Ocean-Atmosphere-Wave-Sediment Transport (COAWST) model, to explore the oceanic surface boudanry layer (OSBL) turbulence and its role in marine particle dynamics. I’m also interested in the theory and numerical simulation of large-scale ocean circulation.
